14
THE DECEASED'S PARENTS AND SPOUSE
(1) The estate of a deceased person who does not leave any descendants shall be inherited by his or her parents and his or her spouse.
(2) The deceased's parents shall inherit one half of the estate in equal shares and the deceased's spouse shall inherit the other half of the estate.
(3) If the deceased does not leave a spouse, the parents of the deceased shall inherit the entire estate in equal shares.
